mapper.select:
select t1.diagnosisId,
CASE WHEN t1.pathologyDiagnosis IS NULL OR LENGTH(t1.pathologyDiagnosis) =0 THEN t1.diagnosis ELSE t1.pathologyDiagnosis END diagnosis, CASE WHEN t1.pathologyDiagnosis IS NULL OR LENGTH(t1.pathologyDiagnosis) =0 THEN t1.diseaseCode ELSE t1.pathologyDiagnosisCode END diseaseCode, CASE WHEN t1.pathologyDiagnosis IS NULL OR LENGTH(t1.pathologyDiagnosis) =0 THEN t1.diagnosis ELSE t1.pathologyDiagnosis END pathologyDiagnosis, CASE WHEN t1.pathologyDiagnosis IS NULL OR LENGTH(t1.pathologyDiagnosis) =0 THEN t1.diseaseCode ELSE t1.pathologyDiagnosisCode END pathologyDiagnosisCode, 9 diagnosisTypeId,
t1.diagnosis,t1.diseaseCode,t1.pathologyDiagnosis,t1.diagnosisTypeId,t1.pathologyDiagnosisCode,
t1.visitTime,t1.organCode,t1.organName,t1.inHospitalCondition,t1.outhospitalCondition,t1.inhospitalId, t1.isSourceDiagnosis, CASE WHEN t1.isSourceDiagnosis < 1 THEN 100 ELSE t1.isSourceDiagnosis END sortIndex,
IFNULL(t2.sourceFlag,3) sourceFlag,t2.creatorId ,t3.deseaseBodyPartName,t4.diseaseTypeName,t5.disagnosisPeriodizationName ,CASE t2.sourceFlag WHEN 0 THEN "未知" WHEN 1 THEN "患者本人" WHEN 2 THEN t6.trueName WHEN 3 THEN "住院病案" ELSE "住院病案" END creatorName ,t7.pathologyDiagnosisName,i.outhospitalDate,CONCAT(i.tumourPeriodization,i.tumourPeriodizationT,i.tumourPeriodizationN,i.tumourPeriodizationM1,i.tumourPeriodizationM2) tumourPeriodization,i.catalogState from ehr_db.e_diagnosis_info t1 LEFT JOIN ehr_db.ei_inhospital_note i ON t1.inhospitalId=i.inhospitalId LEFT JOIN ehr_db.e_medical_record t2 ON t1.emrId = t2.emrId LEFT JOIN ehr_db.meta_e_disease_body_part t3 ON t1.diseaseBodyPartId = t3.deseaseBodyPartId LEFT JOIN ehr_db.meta_c_disease_type t4 ON t1.diseaseTypeId = t4.diseaseTypeId LEFT JOIN ehr_db.meta_e_diagnosis_periodization t5 ON t1.disagnosisPeriodizationId = t5.disagnosisPeriodizationId LEFT JOIN user_db.u_doctor t6 ON t2.sourceFlag=2 AND t6.doctorId = t2.creatorId LEFT JOIN ehr_db.meta_e_icd_o_3 t7 ON REPLACE(IFNULL(t1.pathologyDiagnosisCode,t1.diseaseCode),"M","") = t7.pathologyDiagnosisCode WHERE t1.patientId = #{patientId}
AND t1.diagnosisTypeId in (1,2,9)
AND (diagnosisTypeId=9 OR t1.pathologyDiagnosis is not NULL AND LENGTH(t1.pathologyDiagnosis)>0)
AND t1.diagnosisTypeId=#{diagnosisTypeId}
AND t1.diagnosis LIKE '%${diagnosis}%'
AND t1.inhospitalId=#{inhospitalId}
GROUP BY diagnosis,diseaseCode,visitTime
ORDER BY t1.inhospitalId
ORDER BY sortIndex ASC,t1.visitTime ASC
ORDER BY t1.visitTime DESC
